I Kall N17 PRICE IN INDIA

I Kall N17 price in India starts from Rs. 7,499. The lowest price of I Kall N17 is Rs. 7,499 at flipkart.com. This is 3 GB RAM / 32 GB internal storage base variant of I Kall N17 which is available in Green colour.
